channel.title: Haskell on Matt Snider
channel.description: Recent content in Haskell on Matt Snider

item.title: dict.cc CLI Client
item.description: While learning German, I found that frequently looking up translations on dict.cc was slow - open the browser, type in the URL, wait for it to load, type in the search, etc. Being able to do this in the terminal sped things up. I also wanted to improve my knowledge of Haskell and this was a good first project.
